            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'indicateur universel</string>

            <string language="en">This illustration shows the colour changes in a universal indicator depending on the pH of a substance.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les changements de

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as mudanças da cor em um
